description: Avengers: Endgame is a superhero film produced by Marvel Studios. It was released in 2019 and is a significant part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU).
Black Panther is a superhero film produced by Marvel Studios. It was released in 2018 and features the character T'Challa, the king of Wakanda.
Guardians of the Galaxy is a superhero film produced by Marvel Studios. It was released in 2014 and follows a group of intergalactic misfits.
Spider-Man: Far From Home is a superhero film produced by Marvel Studios. It was released in 2019 and features the character Peter Parker.
Thor: Ragnarok is a superhero film produced by Marvel Studios. It was released in 2017 and follows the character Thor.
The Shawshank Redemption is a drama film produced by Castle Rock Entertainment. It was released in 1994 and is based on the novella Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption by Stephen King.
The Green Mile is a drama film produced by Castle Rock Entertainment. It was released in 1999 and is based on the novel by Stephen King.
The Dark Knight is an action film produced by Warner Bros. Pictures. It was released in 2008 and is the second installment of Christopher Nolan's Batman trilogy.
Inception is an action film produced by Warner Bros. Pictures. It was released in 2010 and is directed by Christopher Nolan, exploring the concept of dreams within dreams.
Finding Nemo is an animated film produced by Pixar Animation Studios. It was released in 2003 and follows the journey of a clownfish named Marlin to find his son Nemo.
Toy Story is an animated film produced by Pixar Animation Studios. It was released in 1995 and is the first feature-length film created entirely by computer-generated animation.
The Matrix is a science fiction film produced by Warner Bros. Pictures. It was released in 1999 and explores a dystopian future where reality is simulated by machines.
Blade Runner is a science fiction film produced by Warner Bros. Pictures. It was released in 1982 and is based on Philip K. Dick's novel 'Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?'
